channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Fans Choose KATSEYE’s ‘Beautiful Chaos’ as This Week’s Favorite New Music
item.description: 🎶 Let’s jam to the sounds of KATSEYE's 'Beautiful Chaos' - the ultimate favorite of the week! 🌟🎵 #NewMusicMonday

item.title: Olivia Rodrigo Performs with The Cure’s Robert Smith at Glastonbury: Watch
item.description: Olivia Rodrigo and Robert Smith rock Glastonbury together! 🎶 Watch their epic collab now! #MusicLegendsUnite #GlastonburyVibes

item.title: Charli XCX Responds To Boomers Criticizing Her Use Of AutoTune At Glastonbury
item.description: 🎤 Charli XCX shuts down haters, embracing her AutoTune magic at Glastonbury! Who's ready for more futuristic pop vibes? 🌟 #CharliXCX #AutoTuneDreams

item.title: Chat Pile Defend LCD Soundsystem, Los Campesinos! Explain Haim Beef, & Momma Are Bewildered In Our New Video Q&As
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the drama! Get the scoop from Chat Pile, Los Campesinos!, and Momma in our juicy new video interviews! 🍿 #MusicGossip #SpillTheTea

item.title: See Dua Lipa Cover Sinead O’Connor, the Beatles on U.K. Tour Stops
item.description: 🎶 Dua Lipa serving iconic covers on U.K. tour! 🇬🇧 Which song are you most excited to hear her rock? #musicnews #duaipa #coverqueen 🎤✨
